title: Timicon
summary: Timicon is a beautiful watchface that let's you access all relevant information
description: Timicon is a beautiful watchface that let's you access all relevant information.It features 7 color themes (one based on battery level) and lot's of options.This app is not compatible with Android Wear devices (like Gear Live or LG G watch).It operates on devices that run Android like the Omate TrueSmart.The app shows interactive icons for:- Airplane mode /on/off- WiFi on/off/connected- Service state on/off/roaming- One custom app- Alarm clock- GPS on/off- Number of missed text messages- Number of missed calls- Bluetooth on/off/connected- Battery level- Ringer mode normal/silent/vibrateAll icons are clickable, either opening the corresponding app or toggling the setting immediately.
descriptionHTML:
Timicon is a beautiful watchface that let's you access all relevant information.
It features 7 color themes (one based on battery level) and lot's of options.

This app is not compatible with Android Wear devices (like Gear Live or LG G watch).
It operates on devices that run Android like the Omate TrueSmart.

The app shows interactive icons for:
- Airplane mode /on/off
- WiFi on/off/connected
- Service state on/off/roaming
- One custom app
- Alarm clock
- GPS on/off
- Number of missed text messages
- Number of missed calls
- Bluetooth on/off/connected
- Battery level
- Ringer mode normal/silent/vibrate

All icons are clickable, either opening the corresponding app or toggling the setting immediately.
comments: Sony smart watch 3 Since all the smart watches I have looked into have been androidware wouldn't it be wise to make this app compatible with such devices? That said it works well on the Z3 compact!
Doesn't show up as watch face on Gear live. Is this not compatible with android wear?
:-) best so far for Standalone full android smartwatch!  No Ads and Free Works great on standalone smartwatch zgpax s6... I would gladly pay or donate (thru play) for this!
Not working On my LG G Watch R.
Perfect Watchface for a Smartwatch Everything you need just on your watchface. Elegant and functional! PERFECT
love it. works great on my macwear m7
